!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Sep 20, 2004 10:20:54.34

ent.java:781)

Fixed in conjuction with bug 74283. The stream monitor now waits for first 
notification of text appeneded or disposal, at which time the buffer is 
flushed.
